actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a tax credit to taxpayers who recycle certain agricultural chemical containers in accordance with the applicable laws and regulations.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide an income tax credit for the recycling of metal containers used to store agricultural chemicals. Sets the amount of such credit at 25 cents per pound of qualified agricultural chemical container which the taxpayer recycles.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a tax credit to taxpayers who recycle certain agricultural chemical containers in accordance with the applicable laws and regulations.
